CustomField.description: This field is used to control which SRs are shown as options when running dispatcher using the "For Scheduling" scheduling policy. Set this field to TRUE to have this SR included.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field is used to control which SRs are shown as options when running dispatcher using the "For Scheduling" scheduling policy. Set this field to TRUE to have this SR included.
CustomField.label: For Scheduling Resource
